column5: This home is on the North Side of San Antonio, 3 minutes away from a great golfing course and a JW Marriott Resort and Spa. This is a great stopping place for a family and comes with all amenities from cable, internet to a laundry room and 2 bathrooms. This house is against a green belt so you can enjoy the back yard and nature.This area is safe and my neighbors are also great! Hope you enjoy your stay and more so enjoy San Antonio!
column8: A Cozy Home with a Beautiful Nature Views
